rows.label: qst700401_msg0001
rows.name:
Meh meh...
Do not suppose there any chance
that friends are mighty heroic warriors?

rows.label: qst700401_msg0002
rows.name:
Morumo in charge of shopping ward,
so good judge of character become
kind of second nature.

rows.label: qst700401_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, it clear as cloudless sky now!
Friends just the heroes Morumo
searching for!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0004
rows.name:
Terrible thing. Gogols start take up
residence in Pilgrims' Springland Peln.

rows.label: qst700401_msg0005
rows.name:
Oasis no more place for resty-rest.
Makes usual cargo route many
much times longer!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0006
rows.name:
And one thing now very clear...
Morumo now on verge of financial
meltdown!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0007
rows.name:
Friends have no idea how dire straits
are for Morumo. So dire. Deeply dire!
Morumo drown pillow in tears at night!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0008
rows.name:
Morumo want friends to chase nuisance
Gogols out of oasis! Will drown friends
in thank-yous if success!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0009
rows.name:
But Morumo know hero-friends will
succeed anyway. It written in script
of life!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0101
rows.name:
Stupid Gogols think they own oasis!
Gogols not buy property! Gogols not
even understand laws of tenancy!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0102
rows.name:
Please, friends get rid of Gogols and
make lives of everypon better. Morumo
shower you with a million thank-yous!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0103
rows.name:
Morumo know hero-friends will
succeed. Morumo believe in you!

rows.label: qst700401_msg0201
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Friends found
head honcho of Gogols?

rows.label: qst700401_msg0202
rows.name:
Come to think, Morumo maybe seen
Gogol Boss once before! It biggest in
pack, with muscles all bulgy, no?

rows.label: qst700401_msg0203
rows.name:
It always looking down on Morumo
and company from above. Gogols never
taught that it rude to stare?

rows.label: qst700401_msg0204
rows.name:
Please, friends! Would sincerely
appreciate if friends could set
Gogols straight!
